title: Attention
body:
Due to some changes upstream at Sunshine (BETA), additional actions are required to fix possible malfunctioning.
To fix it, please run in the terminal:
<hr/>
systemctl --user disable --now sunshine.service
systemctl --user enable --now sunshine-kms.service
if: [[ $(systemctl --user is-enabled sunshine.service) == enabled && $(systemctl --user is-enabled sunshine-kms.service) == disabled ]]
